scripts.dev: npm run build --workspace @pathbound/shared && concurrently -n server,client -c cyan,green "npm:dev --workspace @pathbound/server" "npm:dev --workspace @pathbound/client"
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace @pathbound/shared && npm run build --workspace @pathbound/server && npm run build --workspace @pathbound/client
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck --workspace @pathbound/shared && npm run typecheck --workspace @pathbound/server && npm run typecheck --workspace @pathbound/client
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace @pathbound/shared && npm run lint --workspace @pathbound/server && npm run lint --workspace @pathbound/client
